resource.description: Little Endian UTF-16 encoded plain text.
Big Endian UTF-16 encoded plain text.
A wrongly file claiming to be UTF-8 encoded plain text.
A file containing a non-XML character
A file with an unknown encoding.

test-case.name: fn-unparsed-text-available-001
test-case.description: Attempts to evaluate the "unparsed-text-available" function with no arguments.

test-case.name: fn-unparsed-text-available-002
test-case.description: Attempts to reference the "unparsed-text-available" function with arity zero.

test-case.name: fn-unparsed-text-available-003
test-case.description: Attempts to reference the "unparsed-text-available" function with arity one.

modified.change: Context-dependent functions can now be referenced without error.

modified.change: Context-dependent functions can now be referenced without error.
